Description:
Generic rule for SQL exceptions in Python according to PEP 249

Author: Thomas Patzke
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Python SQL Exceptions
Query: sourcetype like 'python-%' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%dataerror%' or log like '%integrityerror%' or log like '%programmingerror%' or log like '%operationalerror%')
